name: Creamy Bratwurst Pasta
description: A rich and savory German-inspired main course. This Creamy Bratwurst Pasta features hearty bratwurst sausage cooked in a flavorful tomato and cream sauce with garlic, herbs, and Parmesan cheese, all tossed with pasta. A quick and satisfying meal ready in 25 minutes.
keywords: Creamy Bratwurst Pasta, Bratwurst Pasta, Creamy Pasta, German recipe, German pasta, Sausage pasta, Main Course, Dinner, Comfort food, Quick meal, 25 minute meal, Weeknight dinner, Garlic, Olive Oil, Tomato, Diced Tomatoes, Bratwurst, Cream, Parmesan, Cheese, Thyme, Oregano, Pasta

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice garlic and fry in the olive oil until browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Fry Garlic

recipeInstructions.text: Start cooking pasta. Add tomato, bratwurst and herbs to garlic and olive oil. Bring to vigorous simmer and crush the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Develop Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: After it simmers a bit, add the cream, parmesan and vinegar, and allow it to thicken a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Thicken Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Once the pasta is cooked, add to the sauce and mix together. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve with extra cheese and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.name: Finish and Serve

notes: Great with any sausage but I made it with the bratwurst mince also on this site.
Great with a tsp of capers or a bit of chili.
